title: A Farmer's boy
brief_description: Film about a farmer’s son who is about to start working on his father’s farm. The boy’s parents suggest that he goes to agricultural college. Shows the work of Seale-Hayne Agricultural College, Devon including students pig feeding, milking, butter making, poultry rearing, ploughing, machine maintenance and sheep shearing.
